articles.description: The fourth series of The Crown has highlighted Princess Diana 's influence to a whole new generation, with eBay revealing new research that shows a surge in searches for looks .
articles.content:
While the eighties is often thought of as the decade that fashion forgot, Princess Diana was often applauded for her statement looks from novelty knits to her love of gingham.   
And the fourth seri… [+6512 chars]

articles.author: Chris Hunter
articles.title: Bake Off finalist hits back at Twitter trolls - Kent Online
articles.description: Kent's Great British Bake Off star has hit back at Twitter trolls after she was targeted after she got through to the final.
articles.content:
Great British Bake Off finalist Laura Adlington has called on viewers to show more kindness following Tuesday nights semi final.
The Gravesend-born baker scraped through in patisserie week despite a… [+2927 chars]

articles.title: I'm A Celebrity’s Beverley Callard caught 'fibbing' about fitness video success - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: The Corrie icon made a slip-when when talking about her chart success
articles.content:
